en.insufficientBalance: You can't deposit more than you have in your wallet
en.notEnoughSlippage: The transaction failed, please check your Minimum Deposit Rate
en.error: There was an error with your transaction, please try again
en.generalError: There was an error, please try again
en.zeroRate: You can't deposit at 0% rate, try depositing to another pool
en.fixedRateDepositExplanation: Fixed rate deposit takes tokens from your wallet and deposits into Exactly expecting returns with a fixed rate.
